settings.page.title: Settings
settings.account.username.title: Username
settings.account.username.tips: Email you can use to sign in to your account.
settings.account.username.button.label: Change email
settings.account.password.title: Password
settings.account.password.tips: It's recommended to change your password regularly, or sooner if you suspect any issues.
settings.account.password.button.label: Change password
settings.account.password.form.email.con: Please enter the new password again
settings.account.password.form.email.pas: Password should be at least 10 characters
settings.account.2fa.title: Two-factor authentication
settings.appearance.theme.title: Theme
settings.appearance.theme.form.value.ext: Reload the page for the change to take effect.
settings.appearance.language.title: Language
Reload the page for the change to take effect.
settings.appearance.pagination.title: Pagination
settings.appearance.pagination.form.defa: Please enter default items per page
settings.appearance.workflow.title: Workflow
settings.sslprovider.ca.title: System-wide CA
settings.sslprovider.ca.tips: You can use different CAs for each workflow as well. If you want to do this, please visit the credentials page.
settings.sslprovider.form.provider.label: ACME CA provider
settings.sslprovider.form.provider.help: Notes: The certificate validity lifetime, certificate algorithm, domain names count, and support for wildcard domain names are allowed may vary among different providers. After switching service providers, please check whether the configuration of the workflows needs to be adjusted.
settings.sslprovider.form.letsencryptsta:
The staging environment can reduce the chance of your running up against rate limits.

Learn more:
https://letsencrypt.org/docs/staging-environment/
settings.persistence.alerting.title: Alerting
settings.persistence.alerting.form.certi: Please enter the certificate expiration warning threshold
Notes: It determines when the certificate will be marked as "Expiring-Soon".
settings.persistence.data_retention.form: Please enter the maximum number of retention days for workflow history runs
Notes: Set to 0 to disable cleanup workflow history runs. Recommend setting to 180 days or more.
Please enter the maximum number of retention days for expired certificates
Notes: Set to <b>0</emb> to disable cleanup expired certificates.
settings.diagnostics.logs.title: System logs
settings.diagnostics.crons.title: CRON jobs
settings.about.feedback.title: Help us improve Certimate
settings.about.feedback.subtitle: Tell us how to make Certimate work better for you.
settings.about.contributors.title: Contributors
settings.about.contributors.tips: Thanks to all the people who have contributed to this project.
